ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Fire pot ports...
ygData.msgSnippet: hrmm...if i m right this is used in Timerous Deep??? There is an area where you can port one way using fire pots.  most druids that can port make their bind
ygData.messageBody:
hrmm...if i'm right this is used in Timerous Deep???

There is an area where you can port one way using fire pots. most druids
that can port make their bind points here and use it to travel faster

> -----Original Message-----
> From: MLockridge01@... [SMTP:MLockridge01@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 18, 2001 8:33 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Fire pot ports...
>
> I have heard just a bit of rumor that fire pots can be used to port.
> I have found no real information on this, but keeping my eyes open as
> I travel I have noticed "foreign" fire pots in various locations.
> Does anyone know about fire pot ports?
>
> Barto of Rivervale
>
